Package com.isdintership.epe.service.impl

Class TeamServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
com.isdintership.epe.service.impl.TeamServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.isdintership.epe.service.TeamService
@Service class TeamServiceImpl extends Object implements com.isdintership.epe.service.TeamService
TeamServiceImpl is a service class that implements the TeamService interface.

This class handles all requests to the team table

Since:
1.0
Author:
Maxim Gribencicov, Andrei Chetrean
